description: Contains Home Health care plan intervention discipline information.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan intervention.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INTERV_DISC_ID
columns.description: Care plan intervention discipline ID.  Links to table DISCIPLINE.

columns.name: INTERV_DISC_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.
